data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Caroline S. N., Fonseca-Gessner, Alaíde A., Silva, Mário Antônio Navarro (2008): The immature stages of Ablabesmyia (Sartaia) metica Roback, 1983 (Diptera: Chironomidae) with keys to subgenera. Zootaxa 1808: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182745
